how_can_i_buy_eshare_package: How can i buy Eshare package
to_start_with_please_visit_the_binance_w:
1. To start with, please visit the Binance website: https://www.binance.com and Log In to your Binance account.

2. After you have logged in to your account, please click【Wallet】-【Deposit】on the upper right-hand side of the page.

3. Please input the abbreviation or full name of a coin/token that you want to deposit or select it from the list.

4. We will use BTC as an example. In order to quickly get the BTC deposit address for your account, click on 【Copy BTC Deposit Address】, and paste it to the corresponding platform’s address section, where you intend to withdraw your funds from. Alternatively, you can also click【Show QR code】, and use the corresponding platform’s mobile app to scan the QR code to complete your deposit to Binance. Please kindly be advised: 【Deposit】to Binance is a withdrawal action from a corresponding platform or wallet. If you choose to deposit BTC to Binance, please make sure you choose to withdraw BTC from the corresponding platform. Any non-BTC deposits that go to your BTC address on Binance are more likely to be lost and unable to be retrieved. mceclip3.png

5. When depositing some specific tokens, you will need to not only input the correct deposit address, but also fill in the【Tag】 section which might be required for your deposit to be credited. (NOTE:【Tag】may also refer to a Memo or Payment ID) Please make sure that both【Tag】(if needed) and deposit address are accurate and correctly filled for your deposit to Binance be successful. To confirm that you are fully aware of the necessity for a【Tag】field and accurate deposit address, please tick the box for【I understand that deposits without a MEMO will be lost】and click【Continue】 mceclip4.png

6. This time we will use BNB as an example. In order to quickly get your BNB deposit address and MEMO you can click on both 【Copy MEMO】and 【Copy Address】buttons, and paste them to the corresponding platform’s or wallet’s MEMO and address section you intend to withdraw from. You can also click 【Show QR code】, and use the corresponding platform’s mobile app to scan the QR code and complete your deposit to your Binance account.mceclip5.png

7. After you successfully deposit your funds to Binance, you can go back to the Binance home page, hover on 【Wallet】and choose【Deposit & Withdrawal History】to see the details and status of your recent deposit. You can visit the blockchain to check the status and more details of any specific deposit transaction by clicking on the hash in theTxID column. mceclip6.png

8. In addition, Binance has integrated with the following platforms to enable our users to buy cryptocurrency with a credit card, debit card or stablecoins: Simplex, TrustToken, and Paxos. If you want to buy or sell cryptocurrencies and stablecoins directly to your Binance account, click on the【Buy/Sell Crypto】button - you’ll also find more details about the process there.

installment_payment_allows_you_purchase_: Installment payment allows you to purchase an eShare package and make monthly payments for the package at 0% interest rate. There are 3 installment payment options: pay 10% per month in 10 months, pay 5% per month in 20 months, pay 2% per month in 50 months
eshare_code_will_only_be_6_month: With this payment option, eShare code will only be available 6 months after you have completed the installment payment. After choosing the installment payment option, you can still pay in full at anytime. eShare packages paid in installments will NOT be calculated in your Maxout until you paid 100%and you CAN’T use eShare code to redeem when purchase.
eShare_commission_is_only_calculated_whe:
Commission Calculation
EShare commission is only calculated when you make the first payment and monthly payment or pay in full for all the amount left.
you_have_maximum_7days_late:
Please make sure your balance has enough USDT for automatic charge.You have maximum 7 days late. After 7 days, your eShare package will be completely cancelled and all your payment for that eShare package can’t be restored. For example: If you purchase a package using installment payment at 15:00 on October 1, 2020, then after 30 days, you must pay the installment payment at 15:00 on October 31, 2020, after that, late fee will be calculated. After 7 days which means after 15:00 on November 7, 2020, your eShare package will be COMPLETELY CANCELED.
For each day late, you will have to pay 1% of the amount needed to pay in that month per day. For example you choose to pay $1000 in 10 times, when you pay late 6 days, you have to pay the late fee as follow: $1000 / 10 x 1% x 6 = $6.
you_can_pay_all_amount_left_in_your_inst: You can pay all amount left in your installment at any time. The fee for this is 1% of the amount needed to pay all.
lock_period_will_start_after_payment_is_: Lock period will start after 100% payment is made. After every 6 months from the Lock period, 50% of your eShare value will be unlocked. Unlocked eShare can be converted to eShare code.
eshare_code_is_generated_from_unlocked: eShare code is generated from unlocked eShare and represent the eShare value equivalent to these amount: $50, $125, $250, $375, $500, $1250, $2500, $3750, $5000, $12500, $25000, $37500, $50000, $125000, $250000, $500000.
go_to_eshare_balance_to_see_your_code_wa: Go to eShare Balance at http://winsbank.io/user/eshare-balance to see your Code Wallet and find the “Generate code” section
choose_code_value_to_generate_eshare_cod: In this example, you have $18,250 in your Code Wallet, so you can generate for a total of $18,250 in eShare codes. Choose “Code value” to generate eShare code
press_generate_now: In this example, let’s generate $12,500 in eShare code. Choose the value and press “Generate Now”.
you_can_copy_and_share_the_code_to_your_: You can copy and share the code to your friends. You can find the code and the nickname of the person who used your eShare code in the “Generate history” section.
eshare_code_can_be_used_to_reduce_maximu: eShare code can be used to reduce maximum 50% of an eShare package in the next purchase. eShare code can ONLY be used for full payment of an eShare package.
go_to_eshare_session: Go to https://winsbank.io/user/eshare-session to choose the eShare package you want to purchase
choose_full_payment_method: Choose the <u>Full payment</u> method. Enter your eShare code and press “Apply”. Then press “Buy now” to complete the purchase. Your eShare code must be lower than the value of your eShare package.
maxout_is_the_maximum_amount:
Maxout is the maximum amount of eShare Commission you can receive at the moment.

Maxout Calculation:
Your Maxout = Total value of your fully paid eShare packages x 3

Your Maxout won’t decrease. You can increase your Maxout by purchasing more eShare packages.

Go to http://winsbank.io/eshare-network and find the “Eshare” section to see your Maxout.
you_can_see_total_commission_maxout: In this example, you can see “Total Commission/Maxout: 68,775.50/226,350.00” which means you have earned $68,775.50 in Commission and can earn maximum $226,350.00 in Commission.
eshare_ranking_is_based: EShare Ranking is based on the total value of the eShare packages you purchased. The higher your eShare ranking, the more downlines you can receive commissions from.

The organizing committee's decision is final and will not participate in any related debates
